mapper.insert:
insert into sg_blog.sys_user(user_name, nick_name, password, type, status, email, phonenumber, sex, avatar, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag) values
(#{entity.userName}, #{entity.nickName}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.phonenumber}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.avatar}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.delFlag})

insert into sg_blog.sys_user(user_name, nick_name, password, type, status, email, phonenumber, sex, avatar, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag) values
(#{entity.userName}, #{entity.nickName}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.phonenumber}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.avatar}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.delFlag})
on duplicate key update user_name = values(user_name) , nick_name = values(nick_name) , password = values(password) , type = values(type) , status = values(status) , email = values(email) , phonenumber = values(phonenumber) , sex = values(sex) , avatar = values(avatar) , create_by = values(create_by) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_by = values(update_by) , update_time = values(update_time) , del_flag = values(del_flag)
